channel.title: Blogdown on Sudarshana A
channel.description: Recent content in Blogdown on Sudarshana A

item.title: New Personal Blog using Blogdown
item.description: Past few days I was busy with DataCamp lessons and not much time for write something new. I have transfred by previous blog entries(SnD Creations) to new repository and used blogdown with beautifulhugo theme. Several Hugo themes have been used beofre selecting beautifulhugo theme. I want somehting similar to bootstrap with fixed navigation bar, plus support for Math. Thanks to blogdown book from Yihui Xie, finally I have re-launched the site using blogdown & Hugo.
